I implementet my idea of an Item transport System. To that I designed a simple tube, composed of an aluminum frame and vision panels made of glas.

The pipe can be placed free standing and can be filled by hoppers or any device that works the same. A Item putted in going to wait at this pipe segment until it found a possible target. It prefer the nearst Inventory.
If an itemstack can't be carried away it will block the pipe segment against Inserting more Items.
Configuration: Using the Scrench I'm able to configurate every side of an pipe segment, so I can prevent from connect to this side. (§lright click§r on desired side)
